message.name: About me
description: A flexible, proactive and positive Full Stack Engineer with success in managing development projects. Successfully managed development projects and created new websites with mathematical and logical solutions. An expert at multitasking and can handle multiple projects at once, while still meeting all deadlines.

I graduated from Moscow State Industrial University as a Bachelor of Computer Science in 2016. Started my career journey from Junior Frontend Developer to Team Leader & Full Stack Engineer, working across different countries including Russia, Israel, and Poland. My experience spans from startups to large enterprises like EPAM Systems.

My philosophy is to create things that could really help people. I try to create intuitive, accessible, beautiful, and fun digital products. Also great at explaining technical information in a clear and understandable way to audiences.

message.name: SUMO Scheduler (2023-now)
description: Successfully led a development team of 4 in-house engineers, 4 contractors, and coordinated external contractor teams to deliver a robust scheduling platform for mid- and large-sized enterprises.

Built a scalable microservices architecture on AWS using Amplify, Lambda (Java & Node.js), GraphQL, and DynamoDB. Delivered a feature-rich frontend with React, Redux, and TypeScript, with a strong emphasis on intuitive UX and distinctive UI.

Implemented AI tools including Notetaker AI for automated meeting summaries, Flowise with Chatflows, and Chatwoot to deploy client-facing AI agents for meeting creation and support. Established and ran Agile/Scrum workflows from scratch.

message.name: EPAM Systems (2021-2023)
description: Lead Frontend Developer managing a team of three developers, working on multiple high-performance React websites with Redux and TypeScript. Responsible for EPIC planning and implementation for the next quarter.

Successfully managed development projects with a branched network of internal service modules. Collaborated with backend teams using Java/Python (FastAPI) and Ruby (Rails) to design and integrate scalable APIs.

Previously worked as Senior Frontend Developer (2020-2021) developing projects from scratch using React, including graphs, tables, charts, and consoles. Transferred over 100k lines of code from Angular 8 to React and moved FE services to Kubernetes.

message.name: InLoop LLC (2019-2020)
description: Senior Frontend Developer at Tel Aviv-based startup providing news aggregation solutions. Created new features using React, such as the ability for users to add, save, and comment on articles and events.

Developed an unprecedented new admin panel for company managers to control all generated content and client support on Redux. Provided developer support, including coding standards, code reviews, local dev environments, and CI.
This intelligent environment selects news for clients based on region, topic, and category. Also created a web application using React that can manage CSV files to clean, filter, and manipulate data.

message.name: Cultural Service Inc. (2017-2018)
description: Frontend Development Head leading a team of six people at Moscow-based company. Developed a progressive web app using Vue.js and React, providing event organizers and distributors with several ways to sell tickets.

Led the team executing all phases of event planning and production spanning committee recruitment, training, and vendor relationships. Recommended solutions for a streamlined, user-friendly interface working closely with the design team.

Previously worked as Frontend Developer (2016-2017) on web app based on Angular 6, developed adaptive ticket sales website on Play framework with Ajax and PostgreSQL, implemented various APIs integration.

message.name: Early Career Projects (2015-2016)
description: Junior Frontend Developer working on various projects including chitai-gorod.ru - a service for selling books and audiobooks with WebApp for reading and listening to purchased library.

Developed purchase pages, redesigned shopping carts, created news display blocks. Also worked on redesigning and developing existing web pages, minimizing code using CSS and JS, and learning tools like LESS and Stylus for CSS development.
Assisted teams with testing code in multiple browsers and gained foundational experience in cross-browser compatibility and responsive design principles.

message.name: Manuliatina Game (2019)
description: Personal project: interactive visual novel engine with location-based movement system. Developed a complete game engine from scratch with save/load functionality and interactive object system.
The application dynamically loads location data, background music, and navigation paths from MongoDB database. Features include inventory system, character interactions, and branching storylines.
Built with React for smooth user interactions and SCSS for pixel-perfect styling. This project demonstrates full-stack development skills and creative problem-solving in game development.
